issue.title: [FlightRPC][C++] Flight/C++ middleware don't receive headers on failed calls to Java servers
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8776](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8776). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For a failed call, gRPC/Java may consolidate headers with trailers, so Flight/C++ needs to check both headers and trailers to get any headers that may have been sent.
